version_description:
To celebrate Fall and Halloween, pumpkins, ghosts, witches and vampires are all around the preschool.
- Turn off the lights inside the school to play ghost buster,
- Carve 3D pumpkins and grow them in a multiplayer patch.

Other new content includes:
- Learn to count from 1 to 10 with cute little ducks.
This game is designed for very young players. The ducks react to their touch, they hear and memorize the 123 sequence.
- Ever dream of typing on an old-style typewriter?
Your kids can now type away freely on our vintage typewriter and then use fun stickers to decorate their note.

This new version was prepared specially for Spring and Easter and features:
- A fun new infirmary to treat the children
- AR/3D rabbit
- Hidden surprises to celebrate Spring/Easter
- Cute Easter/Spring iMessage stickers
- 2 new games: Tangram editor, Odd & even
- minor bug fixes

This new version was prepared specially for Spring and Easter and features:
- A fun new infirmary to treat the children
- AR/3D rabbit
- Hidden surprises to celebrate Spring/Easter
- Cute Easter/Spring iMessage stickers
- 2 new games: Tangram editor, Odd & even
- minor bug fixes
Spring version.

Get ready to enjoy our Halloween version!
- An exciting ghost hunt awaits your little ones in the hallway and the fun continues outdoors! Old MacDonald needs help watering and picking pumpkins from his patch.
- New game to discover the binary system: Kids will learn to count like a computer using only 0 and 1 numerals. This activity will sharpen their problem solving skills and develop their understanding of the decimal system.
- New features of the Healthy Habits game: Repeating simple daily tasks with a clear objective fosters children’s autonomy. In this updated game, they can use a tissue to blow their nose, style hair with barrettes or use a blow dryer.

- Play soccer in our garden.
- Take a look at our 3 new math activities, designed to teach children how to read an analog clock. This learning process takes practice, but conveys important basic math concepts as well as an understanding of time.
- Check out the fun new games in Old MacDonald’s farm. Discover our educational section where kids participate in practical farming activities and interact with animals.
- Adults will also benefit from this update! We’ve completely redesigned the parents’ dashboard; it now has sections allowing for an improved management of user activities. Also, playtime and access to the different classrooms can be customized for each child.

It's the Holiday season, this update is filled with gifts!
- Our Advent calendar distributes a new surprise every day, from December 1st.
- A new quiz & tracing game for numbers from 0 to 9
- A fun game to learn a few basic sounds in Mandarin
- 10 new coding logic levels...and more

It's the Holiday season, this update is filled with gifts!
- Our Advent calendar distributes a new surprise every day, from December 1st.
- A new quiz & tracing game for numbers from 0 to 9
- A fun game to learn a few basic sounds in Mandarin
- 10 new coding logic levels...and more

Let’s celebrate Chinese New Year with several surprises in the hallway and garden (look for the pig, this year's symbol).
We've added more games to foster Chinese language skills:
- Kids will discover their first ideograms in a playful and visual way.
- Another game teaches basic Chinese words at a grocery store. Your children will go shopping and learn to count as well as memorize each item‘s name.
Finally, a 3D kitchen game introduces healthy eating habits by inviting users to select balanced ingredients, prepare them and cook them.

Let’s celebrate Chinese New Year with several surprises in the hallway and garden (look for the pig, this year's symbol).
We've added more games to foster Chinese language skills:
- Kids will discover their first ideograms in a playful and visual way.
- Another game teaches basic Chinese words at a grocery store. Your children will go shopping and learn to count as well as memorize each item‘s name.
Finally, a 3D kitchen game introduces healthy eating habits by inviting users to select balanced ingredients, prepare them and cook them.

Spring is here! Flowers are blooming and Montessori preschool players will now be able to watch the pollination process thanks to the brand-new bee hive.
- If your kids enjoyed the kitchen in the previous update, they will love it even more now, we’ve added a big pot for them to enjoy more ways to prepare a yummy meal.
- The Chinese Pinyin game now includes consonants. Your children’s Mandarin skills will improve even more.
- Last but not least, we’ve added German to the list of languages in which your children can learn. Simply open the app settings to select this new option.

- Some Easter eggs are hidden in our Montessori Preschool. Children need to find all of the 10 eggs, bring them to the pig and receive a surprise in return.
- Continue to practice Chinese! New colourful ideograms can be traced and discovered.
- Younger children can enjoy driving a school bus and manipulate objects in a reactive environment, stimulating their creativity and fine motor skills.

- Some Easter eggs are hidden in our Montessori Preschool. Children need to find all of the 10 eggs, bring them to the pig and receive a surprise in return.
- Continue to practice Chinese! New colourful ideograms can be traced and discovered.
- Younger children can enjoy driving a school bus and manipulate objects in a reactive environment, stimulating their creativity and fine motor skills.

- New activities to improve children's knowledge of Chinese words. Children can combine Pinyin vowels and consonants in new interactive games. They can also pack a suitcase, go on a trip and learn common Chinese words before leaving to the airport.
- To highlight new Korean language content, you can access the Korean section and enjoy various features helping you immerse into Korean with fun educational activities.

Let's celebrate the Dragon Boat Festival. This Chinese tradition of boat races introduces the upcoming Summer season. With our new activity, children learn musical rhythm at Montessori Preschool. The acquired skills will help them in many everyday situations.

- Play soccer in our garden.
- Take a look at our 3 new math activities, designed to teach children how to read an analog clock. This learning process takes practice, but conveys important basic math concepts as well as an understanding of time.
- Check out the fun new games in Old MacDonald’s farm. Discover our educational section where kids participate in practical farming activities and interact with animals.
- Adults will also benefit from this update! We’ve completely redesigned the parents’ dashboard; it now has sections allowing for an improved management of user activities. Also, playtime and access to the different classrooms can be customized for each child.

Get ready for the new school year!
- Discover a new activity in our practical section, designed to develop healthy habits. Help your children to enjoy brushing their teeth and nurture daily habits while playing!
- New ABC song: Get on board of our ABC train and turn this song into a hit! A guaranteed fun and educational way to discover the letters of the alphabet with the entire family. Also available in Spanish, French and German.
- Foster reading skills by introducing your child to our mid-autumn festival story, celebrated in China on September 13. This interactive story features Hou-Yi and his wife, both defending the magic immortality pill.

Get ready for the new school year!
- Discover the new activity in the app's practical life section, designed to develop healthy habits. Let your children brush their teeth and nurture daily habits, while playing!
- New ABC song: A guaranteed fun and educational way to discover the letters of the alphabet with the whole family. Get on board of our ABC train and turn this song into a hit! Also available in Spanish, French and German.
- Foster reading skills and introduce your kids to the mid-autumn festival, celebrated in China on September 13. This new interactive story features Hou-Yi and his wife, defending the magic immortality pill.

Get ready to enjoy our Halloween version!
- An exciting ghost hunt awaits your little ones in the hallway and the fun continues outdoors! Old MacDonald needs help watering and picking pumpkins from his patch.
- New game to discover the binary system: Kids will learn to count like a computer using only 0 and 1 numerals. This activity will sharpen their problem solving skills and develop their understanding of the decimal system.
- New features of the Healthy Habits game: Repeating simple daily tasks with a clear objective fosters children’s autonomy. In this updated game, they can use a tissue to blow their nose, style hair with barrettes or use a blow dryer.

Get ready to enjoy our Halloween version!
- An exciting ghost hunt awaits your little ones in the hallway and the fun continues outdoors! Old MacDonald needs help watering and picking pumpkins from his patch.
- New game to discover the binary system: Kids will learn to count like a computer using only 0 and 1 numerals. This activity will sharpen their problem solving skills and develop their understanding of the decimal system.
- New features of the Healthy Habits game: Repeating simple daily tasks with a clear objective fosters children’s autonomy. In this updated game, they can use a tissue to blow their nose, style hair with barrettes or use a blow dryer.

Enjoy the latest additions to our Thanksgiving version!

- Put on a turkey costume or get some turkey dinner at the cafeteria
- Turkey game : Have fun hunting for hidden objects in our maze. This critical thinking game teaches children strategies for logical thinking.
- It's also time to help Old MacDonald harvest corn at his farm. Let's get this done before winter starts!

It's time to celebrate winter and the Holidays! A daily surprise awaits your children with our advent calendar; the cute winter-themed stickers can be placed on a landscape that will be completed for Christmas.
Children can also drive Santa's sleigh and help deliver gifts in a fun interactive game.

NEW GAMES
- Drawing step by step: Chose a model and learn how to draw it. This game is ideal to sharpen fine motor skills and drawing techniques.
- Binary series: Test your knowledge of binary and practice numbers from 1 to 15!
- Learn Mandarin: Discover 3 new vowel digraphs in our pinyin learning games.

Celebrate Chinese New Year. The year of the golden rat starts on January 25th, new drawings and fun colouring pages are available for your little ones.
- Dragon Maze: Watch out! The dragon faces an additional challenge crossing the labyrinth, as he has to avoid meteorite showers.
- New binary games: In these two games, binary cards illustrate base-2 numbers. Children practice their calculation skills while having fun.
- Learning Chinese: 3 new Pinyin games and 2 ideograms are available in our Mandarin games.

Spring has sprung!
- Notice how the school is flooded with tulips, help old MacDonald harvest them and gift them to your favorite teacher. Watch out for our annual egg-hunt, it will appear inside the preschool corridor and garden at the beginning of April.
- New game alert! Go to the Code and Logic tab to discover a fun new game for early years. This game, based on years of research, is great to develop reasoning skills and eye-hand coordination.
- As kids learn and play in the app, they earn coins. In this version, we’ve completely re-designed the preschool’s shop to keep your children engaged and motivated.

Summer is around the corner, Montessori Preschool has prepared lots of fun activities to avoid the summer slide.
MAJOR update! Montessori Preschool members can now access our Joy of Reading app as part of their subscription: 2 apps for the price of 1. Joy of Reading is a comprehensive method to learn to read: from phonics to reading full sentences.
Other new activities include:
- Discover Aesop’s famous “The fox and crow” in animated and interactive versions
- Learn Chinese: more Pinyins and new animated Chinese characters
- Critical thinking: new levels in the Shape your mind game - unveil the shape machine!
- Build/modify and try out our new fun train tracks

Summer is around the corner, Montessori Preschool has prepared lots of fun activities to avoid the summer slide.
MAJOR update! Montessori Preschool members can now access our Joy of Reading app as part of their subscription: 2 apps for the price of 1. Joy of Reading is a comprehensive method to learn to read: from phonics to reading full sentences.
Other new activities include:
- Discover Aesop’s famous “The fox and crow” in animated and interactive versions
- Learn Chinese: more Pinyins and new animated Chinese characters
- Critical thinking: new levels in the Shape your mind game - unveil the shape machine!

The summer version is here:
- Now that school is officially over, kids can enjoy 3 new levels of the "Shape your mind" game, including a fun "shape machine".
- This version also offers a brand new customizable train set in the Shop, to be used in our recently redesigned playroom as well as new Chinese characters.
- New language alert: Portuguese is now available throughout our wonderful content.

The summer version is here:
- Now that school is officially over, kids can enjoy 3 new levels of the ""Shape your mind"" game, including a fun ""shape machine"".
- This version also offers a brand new customizable train set in the Shop, to be used in our recently redesigned playroom as well as new Chinese characters.
- New language alert: Portuguese is now available throughout our wonderful content.
Summer version.

BACK TO SCHOOL 2020 :
- Learn to recognize fruits : Help our character make tasty smoothies and learn fruit names at the same time !
- Track the progress in the parental dashboard. Our new progress tracker helps you support the players. Cheer them on when they succeed.

This version is packed with new educational content and it’s ready just in time to celebrate Halloween. Here is what’s inside:
- Great new learning games:
- Toddlers learn vocabulary in a fun interactive environment. Level one: farm words.
- Weird Halloween smoothies to discover more vegetables and fruits.
- Learn to draw: new Halloween themed pictures
- Chinese PinYin consonant
- Games & improvements:
- A fun ghost hunt awaits subscribers inside the preschool
- Help Old MacDonald harvest his pumpkins
- Try the new vampire and witch costumes on the characters
- Discover our improved landing page with easy access to Edoki Club apps
…and much more fun surprises for Thanksgiving!

Let the Holiday season begin!
- Our digital advent calendar: one new sticker per day to be used in a beautiful setting.
Cute seasonal drawings, a fun Santa costume and 2 games, one to practice color sorting.
- Vocabulary and listening comprehension: children learn new words & perform basic tasks on the farm in English or in a foreign language.
Also a present for parents: find a detailed description of each game when you tap the graduation cap in the corner.
Happy holidays, see you in the new year!

Lunar New Year: celebrate the year of the OX throughout the Preschool and learn to count to 10 in Chinese in a truly beautiful setting!
- New for young children; the brand new “talk to Laura” game was designed to enable children to practice oral conversation in a fun, interactive way. Laura asks questions that can be answered using pictograms and her answers vary for each situation.
- Improved train track game: add tunnels and switches.

Lunar New Year: celebrate the year of the OX throughout the Preschool and learn to count to 10 in Chinese in a truly beautiful setting!
- New for young children; the brand new “talk to Laura” game was designed to enable children to practice oral conversation in a fun, interactive way. Laura asks questions that can be answered using pictograms and her answers vary for each situation.
- Improved train track game: add tunnels and switches.

Spring is around the corner, notice how the school is inundated with tulips and the bees are buzzing in the garden.
Watch out for our annual egg-hunt, it will appear inside the preschool corridor and garden soon. Find the 10 hidden eggs and get a cute rabbit costume for the characters.

This spring update is full of interactive activities to learn words in any of the app's languages:
- The farm word game now has 3 complete levels to strengthen vocabulary and listening/comprehension skills.
- The latest nursery rhyme teaches the days of the week, in the right order ;-)
- Laura, the talking avatar will help your child compose a unique piece of music.
- Kids will discover more options in the train game.

Avoid the summer slide with these new additions and practice your favorite sport in the garden!
The “words house” to learn vocabulary in English and Mandarin (but also in 4 other languages)
Animated letter tracing for young learners: water the seeds, watch the letters blossom.
A magical 3D globe to learn about Earth, its continents & oceans but also incredible landmarks. This game also offers older children fun facts to read.
Enjoyed singing “Monday morning”? You’ll love the interactive version!
